Fun Fact: Merriamâ€™s kangaroo rats literally never have to drink water
Litter Size: One to seven babies, though the average litter contains three.
Favorite Food: Seeds and grasses. Some species eat insects and other types of vegetation.
Lifespan: 2 to 5 years though some giant kangaroo rats have been known to live for over 9 years
Length: As long as 14 inches, with an 8-inch tail and 6-inch body. Males are larger than females.
Name: Kangaroo Rat
